title: LeaverBuster a good thing or a bad thing?
body: Im just a causal player in the silver elo but i have pretty bad connection on some days and constantly disconnect, and because of this i get leaverbuster and i think this is sorta unfair. Why do i get leaverbuster when i lag, its not choice to lag but i do. This is pretty unfair riot and i want to ask why do you give leaverbuster to people who disconnect due to high ping.

replies.body: So true. Riot please provide a tweak to compensate for people afking from their internet dying randomly or high ping for unknown reasons!
